text: Kyzyl (Tuvan and ) is a city in Russia. It is the capital of the Tuvan Republic. Its name comes from the Tuvan word for 'red' or 'crimson'. Population: It used to be called Belotsarsk until 1918 and Khem-Beldyr until 1926. == References == Category:Tuva Category:Capitals of republics of Russia
title: Kyzyl
